event: Stream Finance founded; raises $1.5M seed from Polychain Capital
Caleb McMeans ("0xlaw") takes over Stream Finance operations
Steakhouse Financial publishes MetaOracle Deviation Timelock proposal on Morpho governance forum
Morpho V2 (Bundler v2) officially announced
Gauntlet USDC Core exits toxic market allocations ($104.3K peak exposure, 33 days before depeg)
Gauntlet Elixir USDC exits toxic markets ($6K peak exposure, 32 days before depeg)
Morpho V2 contracts deployed on-chain
ETH crashes ~21% ($20B liquidations). Ryan DeMattia liquidated on personal positions; allegedly begins misappropriating ~$93M in Stream funds
Gauntlet USDC Frontier exits toxic markets (8 days before depeg, detected via historical reallocation)
Yearn developer Schlag exposes recursive xUSD-deUSD cross-minting: $1.9M USDC to $14.5M xUSD (7.6x amplification)
On-chain analyst CBB0FE flags 4.1x leverage: $170M backing vs $530M borrowing
Hyperithm may have begun withdrawal from sdeUSD markets (timing correlates with CBB0FE warning)
DeMattia admits to McMeans: lost "nearly all" of ~$93M
McMeans allegedly transfers ~$2.1M from Stream wallets to personal wallets via Railgun privacy mixer
Balancer V2 exploited for ~$100-128M across 6+ chains. Concurrent with xUSD collapse, not causal
Users report xUSD withdrawal delays; Chaos Labs' Omer Goldberg warns of depeg
PeckShield first alert at ~9:34 PM UTC: xUSD down ~23%
Stream Finance announces $93M loss, freezes withdrawals, engages Perkins Coie
xUSD crashes to $0.24-$0.30. Oracle still reports ~$1.00-$1.26, preventing all liquidations
YAM publishes $285M total exposure map across all DeFi protocols
Stani Kulechov (Aave): "the next Terra Luna might be brewing"
Gauntlet vaults hit ~6 hours sub-1% withdrawable liquidity despite zero toxic exposure
Gauntlet proposes emergency pause of Compound USDC/USDS/USDT — sdeUSD oracle at $1.06 vs $0.86 market
MEV Capital acknowledges exposure; Re7 Labs issues first statement
Curators zero supply caps within 8h: MEV Capital Arb (13:40), MEV Capital Eth (16:01), Relend (22:04)
Elixir announces deUSD sunset; processes 1:1 USDC redemptions for 80% of non-Stream holders
Lista DAO initiates emergency liquidation vote against MEV Capital and Re7 Labs vaults (800% borrow rates)
deUSD collapses to $0.015-0.03 (98%+ decline)
Entropy Advisors blacklists MEV Capital + Hyperithm Arbitrum vaults from DRIP rewards
Elixir claims portal launches at elixir.xyz/deusd/claims/
xUSD at $0.07-0.14 (~$30K daily volume). ~$1B exits DeFi yield platforms
MEV Capital confirms Ethereum vault realized ~3.6% bad debt from sdeUSD exposure
Relend USDC share price hits $0.017 — 98.4% drawdown. No public statement from curator
Gauntlet publishes comprehensive market report: zero exposure confirmed with contagion analysis
Elixir claims contracts 2 and 3 go live for remaining deUSD/sdeUSD holders
Lawsuit filed: Stream Trading Corp. v. McMeans — Case No. 3:25-cv-10524, N.D. California
